resources.string:
• Version 1.1.0.8 
• Add sort options in user anime/manga list 
• Updated F.A.Q section 
• Fixed some minor bugs

 Version 1.1.0.7 
• Automatically set number of watched or read ep/ch to max when changing the status to completed 
• Added F.A.Q section 
• Added User friend list in profile section 
• Added User anime list in profile section 
• Added User manga list in profile section 
• Added transition animations 
• Added separate channel for promotional push notifications 
• Reworked login flow 
• Changed stats graph colors 
• Fixed anime/manga items getting cropped in character fragment 
• Fixed images loading with wrong aspect ratios 
• Fixed change log dialog flicker issue 
• Fixed some links not opening is sushi 
• Fixed some ui and layout issues
